name: SurvCraft (itch)
description: In this game you have to survive in a base from invasions of zombies, using  different structures to defend your self from zombies. Its one of my first games, and i am new to uploading games on this web. The game is still in development, so if you find any bugs in the game and have any suggestions please tell me in the comments, thank you. (The game wasn't really meant for a web so i recommend not pressing quit button because its bugged for a web, and its for PC only) (The game was made by me in Unity engine, the 3D props were made by me in Blender and all the sounds in the game are sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com)
